login.multi_factor_auth: Your account has been protected with multi factor authentication. Please enter the code from your google authenticator:
login.setup_webauthn: Your device is compatible to use a form of passwordless authentication. You may setup this now or at any time in the user settings.

error.server: The balloon server reports an ongoing incident, please try it again later.
error.oidc: There was an error authenticate you via the choosen identity provider.
error.webauthn_setup: There was an error to setup passwordless authentication. You may proceed by ignoring this step or try again.
error.webauthn: There was an error to auhenticate using passwordless authentication. You may process by using username/password or try again.
